bibl.title: The Responsibility in Corn-Transport to Alexandria: "sitologoi, epiplooi, deigmatokatagogeus" (P. Berol. inv. 1419 and 7441).
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 1419. Fragments of two letters from the procurator of Neapolis to the strategus of the Herakleidou meris of the Arsinoite nome. Reign of Antoninus Pius. - Inv. 7441. Certificate from a "deigmatokatagogeus". Probably Fayy√ªm, III cent A.D.
bibl.seg: Swiderek Anna, The Responsibility in Corn-Transport to Alexandria: "sitologoi, epiplooi, deigmatokatagogeus" (P. Berol. inv. 1419 and 7441).
